divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting on the porch when we noticed a bright orange object flying. I never saw anything like the object before. It was spherical in shape and emitted an orange glow. The object was moving steadily from the SW to the NE at variable speeds, at times ascending and then descending. Four objects were seen in total travelling in the same direction approximately a minute or two apart in similar paths. The objects disappeared from our field of view. All of us were stunned and surprized as we had never observed anything like this.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kearny
There were no other sightings in Kearny on or around August 2nd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Myself and 2 others saw bright orange spherical objects moving in sky.
